ISSUE.TITLE: Content items actions placement in admin
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: With the latest version of the source code, when I open the Content items admin page, some actions (ex: Unpublish, Delete, Clone) do not appear in the Actions dropdown button as they should: ![image](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/assets/703248/e6febfc2-dfa6-4542-a378-a08efd56558d)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Microsoft Entra ID authentication with multi-tenancy (#14803) Co-authored-by: Zoltán Lehóczky <zoltan.lehoczky@lombiq.com>
